text: As much as I'm into games and VGM, this list is 80% games I haven't played and 25% games I haven't even heard of, so I'm discovering all sorts of cool stuff :)

text:

"Um, guys? There's no monster in this room, you don't need to punch anything..."

author: xSayPleasex

text:
Watching an LP of it recently opened my eyes to more faults... but I went ahead and beat it around the same time and had a good experience. 

I think they're still adding in 2 more characters, I saw the blog showing a lot of progress on the demon arm man / Vladyn.
author: Sephiko

text: Any word on a release date?
author: Matthew Fry

text:
@Matthew Fry "Q: So, like,  when will the Vladyn update happen ? A: Sooooooooooon but no date, sorry! Keep a look out on here for that kind of info! Remember, this isn’t dlc. It will just be updated with the game you already own."
https://endlessfluff.wordpress.com/
author: Sephiko

text: But... I don't like that answer!
author: Matthew Fry

text: @Matthew Fry Added the site to the quote. And if I had to guess, it should be ready by January.

text: @Sephiko Gilda and Vladyn update is live if you hadn't heard!

text: Well, this is another game I hope to play one day. This track is amazing!
author: Dimoskid

text: One of my favorite indie games ever, this is a Metroidvania done right. This really shouldn't have flown under everyone's radar when it released last year, it does almost everything right. The soundtrack is up there as well, it could be made by a high profile composer and I'd absolutely believe it.
author: SupraDarky

text: Picked this up just because of your last music entry to it. Great soundtrack, great game. Can't wait for the future updates with the other playable characters. :D
author: Austin L

text: Maybe the designers can find a way to sorta push a big re-release once all 4 playable characters and extra content is in (for people who haven't bought it yet) ... god knows they deserve more for all the work they continue to do with it!!
author: xSayPleasex

text: Hey Gabe! Have you heard the remixed OST for KH 2.5? Yoko did a really good job on it.

text: @Taislinmaosdela  Yeah there are some great remixes, but I also prefer a lot of the originals. It probably has to do with me being used to those though. Overall a great remaster!
